1.title: The House
1.plot: Grace and Frankie visit the beach house while their worried kids try to track them down. Robert and Sol are caught in an embarrassing situation.

2.title: The Squat
2.plot: Refusing to leave the beach house, Grace and Frankie get support from their ex husbands, who are having their own issue with an unexpected visitor.

3.title: The Aide
3.plot: Bud convinces Frankie to hire a home health aide. Grace fumes when she learns about Brianna's changes to Say Grace. Robert hopes to influence Peter.

4.title: The Crosswalk
4.plot: Grace and Brianna clash at work as Grace faces a tough day. With Joan-Margaret's help, Frankie fights ageism. Peter's casting decision shocks Robert.

5.title: The Pharmacy
5.plot: An unexpected encounter sparks regret in Grace. Sol acts cagey about his new dog's origins. A stranger's ambush of Coyote leads to a revelation.

6.title: The Retreat
6.plot: Frankie takes Grace on a girls trip, which isn't exactly the spa retreat Grace was expecting. Mallory goes on a date. An old friend rebuffs Frankie.

7.title: The Tremor
7.plot: While Frankie worries she's lost her authenticity, Grace frets about Frankie's health. Buds first meeting with Allison's father goes downhill fast.

8.title: The Ceremony
8.plot: Robert feels out of place with the younger guys at rehearsals. Grace doesn't like the new man in Frankie's life. Brianna must make a difficult choice.

9.title: The Website
9.plot: When the Vybrant website goes down, Grace and Frankie must negotiate with a demanding man from Walden Villas. Sol becomes more assertive.

10.title: The Highs
10.plot: Grace takes extreme measures to keep up her hectic schedule. Sol and Frankie have a disagreement about Coyote. Frankie bonds with Robert over edibles.

11.title: The Video
11.plot: While Frankie tries to dig herself out of the business mess she created, Grace comes up with a different solution. Brianna goes to bat for Barry.

12.title: The Wedding
12.plot: Grace returns to town to find that Frankie has everything under control. Bud and Allison's wedding day arrives,but not without some family drama.

13.title: The Alternative
13.plot: In the wake of their big fight, Grace and Frankie imagine what their lives would be like if they hadn't lived together for the last three years.

1.title: The End
1.plot: Grace & Frankie are stunned when their husbands inform them that they want divorces. They're even more stunned when they find out why.

2.title: The Credit Cards
2.plot: The messy realities of divorce start to sink in for Grace, Frankie, Robert, Sol and their equally frazzled adult children.

3.title: The Dinner
3.plot: Grace and Frankie decide to go back to work. Robert and Sol have an awkward dinner party for their children.

4.title: The Funeral
4.plot: Emotions run high When a funeral throws Grace, Frankie, Robert and Sol together in public for the first time since the split.

5.title: The Fall
5.plot: Grace has an eye-opening experience when she goes out for frozen yogurt with Frankie and Brianna on a Saturday night.

6.title: The Earthquake
6.plot: Sol takes care of Frankie after she has an earthquake freak-out, while Grace goes on her first date. Coyote pays Mallory a surprise visit.

7.title: The Spelling Bee
7.plot: Frankie, Grace and Brianna have unexpected encounters when they try new ways to deal with being single.

8.title: The Sex
8.plot: Frankie takes a new look at her Yam Man Jacob, while Grace and Guy get closer. Bud and Coyote have a brotherly talk. Sol is terrified of Brianna.

9.title: The Invitation
9.plot: Brianna tries Frankie's homemade organic beauty product. Robert finds out about Guy and Grace. Frankie tries to set boundaries with Sol.

10.title: The Elevator
10.plot: After they sign the divorce papers, Frankie, Grace, Sol, Robert and Bud remember a pivotal weekend from five years before.

11.title: The Secrets
11.plot: Grace tells Frankie a secret that Frankie shares with Sol, setting off multiple arguments in both houses. Brianna gets closer with a co-worker.

12.title: The Bachelor Party
12.plot: Bud and Coyote ask Brianna and Mallory to help them throw Sol and Robert's bachelor party. Grace offers to do ANYTHING to cheer up Frankie.

13.title: The Vows
13.plot: As the wedding day approaches, Grace and Robert have problems expressing themselves, while Sol and Frankie finally clear out their old house.

1.title: The Wish
1.plot: Sol plans to tell Robert about his betrayal. Frankie is determined to finally separate emotionally from Sol, but events pull her back in.

2.title: The Vitamix
2.plot: Brianna, Mallory and Bud help Sol getting ready with his wedding.

3.title: The Negotiation
3.plot: Brianna wants to produce Frankie's organic yam lube. Grace competes for her grandchildren's affection. Frankie reconnects with her yam man, Jacob.

4.title: The Road Trip
4.plot: Frankie finds on the internet Grace's former lover Phil. They decide to embark on a trip down memory lane.

5.title: The Test
5.plot: Frankie needs to renew her driven license and pass the test again. Grace decides to reconnect with old friends.

6.title: The Chicken
6.plot: While Grace mentors a young woman seeking a new career, Frankie has conflicted feelings for Jacob, who wants more than a business relationship.

7.title: The Boar
7.plot: Grace freaks out when Phil contacts her again. Sol spends the night at the beach house.

8.title: The Anchor
8.plot: Frankie gets mad when she learn that her moisturizer's formula was changed. Meanwhile Sol tries to work things out with Robert.

9.title: The Goodbyes
9.plot: Coyote shares some surprising news. Things go awry when Frankie and Sol host a family brunch. Grace must make a difficult decision about Phil.

10.title: The Loophole
10.plot: Anger, discussions and relief is in the air. Frankie take the battlefield against Brianna. Sol and Robert join in on the fight.

11.title: The Bender
11.plot: Frankie is reunited with an old dear friend, Babe. Her sons meet Jacob over dinner when a drunk Grace interrupts.

12.title: The Party
12.plot: Frankie gets shocking news from Babe, and helps her friend throw the best party of her life.

13.title: The Coup
13.plot: Frankie and Grace got surprise gifts from Babe, which open up new perspectives for both of them. They also discover painful secrets from their former husbands.

1.title: The Art Show
1.plot: Grace and Frankie try to get a bank loan to help start their new business. Frankie's art show is rife with family tensions and minor dramas.

2.title: The Incubator
2.plot: Grace and Frankie pitch their business plan at a hip startup incubator. Grace fights with Jacob. Sol and Robert play hooky from work.

3.title: The Focus Group
3.plot: Grace and Frankie put together a focus group to test their vibrator prototype, but things go awry. Robert and Sol audition for a play.

4.title: The Burglary
4.plot: After they're robbed, Frankie is rattled, but Grace has a secret. With Robert in rehearsals and making new friends, Sol feels left out.

5.title: The Gun
5.plot: Furious about Grace's revelation, Frankie refuses to make up with her. In the wake of his fight with Sol, Robert decides to come out to his mother.

6.title: The Pot
6.plot: Grace and Frankie continue to argue over the gun incident Grace, Brianna and Mallory smoke Frankie's pot before Grace and Frankie settle their fight.

7.title: The Floor
7.plot: Grace and Frankie throw their backs out and lie on the floor trying to make a business meeting, while trying to decide who to call for help.

8.title: The Alert
8.plot: Grace and Frankie launch their business, and Bud brings gifts they're reluctant to accept. Sol is upset that Bud wants to fire a longtime employee.

9.title: The Apology
9.plot: Jacob shares something with Frankie that upsets her. Everyone rallies around Robert when his mother dies. Mallory confides in Brianna.

10.title: The Labels
10.plot: Sol and Robert pitch in when Grace and Frankie are overwhelmed with orders. Bud is thrown for a loop by his girlfriend's interest in the Ménage à Moi.

11.title: The Other Vibrator
11.plot: Grace and Frankie send a cease and desist letter to the company that stole their idea. A homophobic church group protest Robert's play rehearsals.

12.title: The Musical
12.plot: Grace wants Frankie to go to the hospital after a medical incident, but Frankie insists on alternative healing. The protests disrupt Robert's play.

13.title: The Sign
13.plot: Grace and Frankie face a lawsuit. Sol fights back against the homophobic play protesters. Frankie mulls over a move that would change everything.

1.title: The Lodger
1.plot: Frankie visits from Santa Fe to attend the gender reveal party for Bud and Allison's child. She finds out Grace has moved on and taken a lodger, Sheree.

2.title: The Scavengender Hunt
2.plot: Bud and Allison organize a scavenger hunt for the gender reveal party. Frankie suspects Sheree is after Grace's money. Sol goes to protests every day and Robert is worried he might get hurt.

3.title: The Tappys
3.plot: Sheree remembers a letter from her late husband which states she should have the house. The only problem is the letter is in the house and Sheree has no keys to it. Robert gets nominated to a Tappy Award for is role in 1776.

4.title: The Expiration Date
4.plot: Grace is reconsidering her relationship with Nick. Frankie finds out she's been declared officially dead. Robert and Sol meet their new neighbors.

5.title: The Pop-Ups
5.plot: Frankie feels that the universe is giving her signs. Bud is ready to take another step in his relationship with Allison. Robert and Sol have an argument.

6.title: The Hinge
6.plot: Frankie tries to reconnect with her estranged sister. Grace wants to fix a broken window in the house. Robert invites Sol to a folk music cruise. Bud wants Coyote and Allison to be friends.

7.title: The Landline
7.plot: Grace learns her friend Mary has died. Sol has an idea concerning getting Frankie to be officially recognized as alive again. Mallory tries to pitch her business idea to Brianna.

8.title: The Lockdown
8.plot: Allison decides to give birth in her and Bud's apartment and Frankie volunteers to deliver the baby. Grace has to avoid stairs before her knee surgery, so Sol invites her to stay with him and Robert. An escaped orangutan causes a lockdown.

9.title: The Knee
9.plot: Nick helps Grace while she's recovering from surgery. Jacob gets upset with Frankie because she wants to spend all their couple time with the baby.

10.title: The Death Stick
10.plot: Robert and Sol begin therapy. Grace and Frankie gets a surprise when they bring gifts to a fan of their vibrators. Brianna's nemesis makes an offer.

11.title: The Tub
11.plot: Grace is looking for a contractor to fix the house after the bathtub accident. Sol meets with his folk music cruise friend, Roy. Frankie takes Faith on a car ride.

12.title: The Rats
12.plot: Grace and Frankie discover that in addition to having their pipes stolen they have a rat infestation. Bud has doubts whether Frankie should be allowed to babysit again. Robert's musical opens.

13.title: The Home
13.plot: The children suggest Grace and Frankie should live in an assisted living community. Sol and Robert realize something about their relationship.

1.title: Episode #6.1
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.title: Grace and Frankie
plot: Finding out that their husbands are not just work partners, but have also been romantically involved for the last twenty years, two women with an already strained relationship try to cope with the circumstances together.::Charlie McAbee

camera: Red Epic Dragon, Cooke S4 and Angenieux Optimo Lenses
